templates.name: proxy-ogc
templates.title: The proxy to bypass CORS
templates.description: The http used to bypass CORS when webmap calls GeoServer capabilities
templates.note: The PROXY Server will be deployed globally inside the cluster and available on port 80.

templates.name: Nginx HTTP proxy
templates.title: Nginx HTTP proxy
templates.description: The main Nginx-based http proxy as the entry point to all resources in our Swarm cluster
templates.note: This stack is mandatory to provide a bridge as a proxy for services between the cluster and external access.

templates.name: business-api
templates.title: Business API as a Service
templates.description: Using this API you can request for all data like Visions, Layers, Tools, Data Sources, Downloads and Subdomains.
templates.note: This service is mandatory to configure the TreeView of the WebApp and the Download list of WebSite. This stack includes an instance of API and a MongoDB to store JSON documents.

templates.name: mysql
templates.title: The MySQL SGDB and the WebClient PhpMyAdmin.
templates.description: The PhpMyAdmin App allows to manage the databases into any internal instance for MySQL.
templates.note: This stack is mandatory and is used for store and manage the databases of the WordPress such as TerraBrasilis Web site and another PHP web pages.

templates.name: PgAdmin
templates.title: The PgAdmin4 Web Client for PostgreSQL.
templates.description: The PgAdmin4 App allows to manage the databases into any internal instance for PostgreSQL.
templates.note: This stack is optional and serves to manage the databases used for publishing PRODES and DETER data by TerraBrasilis Applications.

templates.name: GeoNetwork
templates.title: The GeoNetwork app for managing metadata.
templates.description: The GeoNetwork application allows managing the metadata catalog and serving it through the WCS API.
templates.note: This stack is mandatory and serves to manage the metadata catalog for TerraBrasilis data.

templates.name: Download static files
templates.title: The web server for delivering static files.
templates.description: A Nginx web server for delivering static files.
templates.note: This stack is mandatory and serves to deliver files on the main download page of TerraBrasilis.
